text: Old rating from CBC 2014. Beer in the glass deep black, small head. Heavy malty-earthy aroma. Starts strong-malty, not too alcoholic, warming-malty. Dry background. Finish well balanced. Quite drinkable for its strength. Nice!

Sampled at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2014. Session 4. Pours clear orange with a white cream topping. Nice, with dry citrus on the nose. Medium sweet flavour, more pleasantly dry citrus fruits, a little citric tang. Medium to full bodied with average carbonation. Lightly warming to conclude, lightly sticky sweet, with further citrus character. Tasty and, overall, pretty well balanced.
Birthday present from J. Hazy orange, white head. Fruity, zesty, lemon and lime nose. Medium light body, good carbonation. Zesty, lightly sour, sherbet fizz. Clean finish. Very tasty.

Light pink. Perfume. Dry sweet. Well hidden alcohol. Interesting but Experimental. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
375 ml bottle. Pours a hazy amber and moderate head. Aromas of creamy caramel, mashed fruit, and a bit of dough. Flavors of slightly sour candied fruit, oak, grapes, and light citrus. Really nice.

Gorgeous orange color. Had a funky, skunky smell, bit of citrus on the nose. Was a part of a blind tasting, so I expected it to be a less-complex gueuze. Sour flavor with a bit of wild yeast and bacteria from the barrel ageing. Notes of grapefruit, rhubarb. Alcohol was well hidden. It was good, not great, though my friend was blown away.

Lukt: Frukter, plomme, krydder og en anelse honning.
Utseende: Gulbrun farge.
Skum/kullsyre: Tynt skum, heng langs kant.
Smak: Syrlig smak av stikkelsb√¶r og rabarbra, noe sur avslutning.

Lovely looking cloudy orange beer with thick white head. Aromas of yeast, lemon, apple... taste starts off sweet, then gets really tart and zesty, with yeast, lemon, sour... not really my bag, but pretty tasty.

Bottle. Hazy pale orange colour. Inch-thick sticky white head, good retention, leaves a thick bubbly layer and uneven lacing. Aroma of ripe fruit (citrus, apple, pear), yeast, barnyard, dessert wine, biscuits. Medium body, way lighter than ABV suggests, soft carbonation. Taste is initially bittersweet and fruity, then predominantly tart, with a lemon zest finish. Well-hidden alcohol.

UPDATED: MAY 2, 2015 Oooo! Bought from the BrewDog AGM 2014 (bottle) . Had it at BrewDog Aberdeen on keg back then too, though it didnae taste quite as Gallas as this. Pours a lovely golden haze with a nice cream head. Great lacing right to the top of a half drunk glass. Quite a powerful zap of a spur on that zest aroma. Might I also say the bottle/label/name etc. is pretty sexy too...I like the Panzer reference with the Gothic script.Well...There?s a really fantastic zesty zang thing going on, and then it just drops off...clean. I must point out there?s also a big natural zest fruit sherbetiness in there too. Lemony Snickets...

Tap @ basement beer bar. Aroma is some sourness, fruity, hops. Hazy amber with white head, not lasting. Sour taste, light sweetness, light bitterness, dry. Medium body, soapy texture, average carbonation, dry finish.
sweet fruit harmonic aroma,pale, cloudy, off white foam, light sweetness, lightly sour, light body, fizzy, soft carbonation, nice sweet sour harmonic finish.

Golden coloured and hazy. Has a white head, lasting. Aroma is aromatic, vanilla, fruity. Flavor starts sweet, then heavy acidic, more fruity and herbal. Nice, complex and still harmonic, well a bit too acidic.
smells of nothing, cloudy amber gold body with no head, tastes just like a sour cheryy cola flavour, sweet finish.

Fad: Oranger√∏d uklar √∏l med et lille skumhoved. Er ikke s√¶rlig p√¶n. Duft af s√∏dlig surhed hvis det giver mening. Helt klart et aftryk fra den √¶dle r√•ddenskab. Smagen er sur men tripplen kan anes bagved. En rigtig fin √∏l der bare ikke er p√¶n.
KRS 111014. Golden colour with an off-white head. Aroma is vineous, fruit, citrus. flavour is orange, malt, alcohol, vineous, fruit, citrus, sugar, lemon. Full body. Nice beer.
Noe t√•kete brun med h√∏yt kremete hvitt skum. Sitruslukter, fersken og noe ananas. Syrlig fruktig, nesten sur smak. Litt s√∏t i smaken men syrligheten kommer fort. Lillestr√∏m √∏lfestival - Klimt

Bottle. Birthday rating no. 2, yey! :-D Pours a hazy straw-hued orange body with a large creamy white head. Nose is grape peel, wood, alcohol, faint stomach acid and hints of white sugar, floral notes and straw. Taste is sour near-bretty barrel tones with lots of red berries and wood, grape peel, straw, pale malts and hints of yeast notes, white sugar and mildly bitter herbs. Medium body, soft to medium carbonation. For being a barrel aged tripel, this sure has plenty of body and a soft, cushy mouthfeel, which works really well with the taste complexity on offer elsewhere in this beer. Really nice.
Gyllen-ravgul, flott skum, uklar. En del humle i aroma, syrlig, noe oksidasjonspreg. Syrlig smak, moderat bitterhet.

Pours a pink shade of gold with a large, frothy white head which remains for about 2-3 minutes before receding to a froth around the edges. Aroma is quite powerful, theres a lot of white wine, lemon and lime citrus going on. Taste is slightly sour at first which is then followed by a slight bitterness. Full bodied with a rich mouthfeel.

Pale warm golden colour, white head. Aroma of white wine, yeast, apricot and malts. Light bitter, bit sweet flavour, white wine. Finish wine.(from draught @ CBC green session, Copenhagen 2014. Thanks for sharing today¬ís beers, RateBeer crew!)
Bottle at home. Pours hazy light orange amber, nose is orange, grape, yeasty, taste is similar, very dry, sweet, juicy.

Bottle at home. Nicely designed bottle. Medium high lasting white head. Hazy milky orange body. Powerful dusty straw aroma with a faint note of apples and wood. Pretty sour flavor with a fruity note and a good deal of hops bitterness. Low carbonation, long bitter sour finish. Alcohol nicely hidden.

(37,5 cl bottle shared threeways; BBD: April 17th 2022) Poured into a mini-snifter. Reveals a hazy amber with little, white head that dissipates quickl leaving mostly lace. Aroma is somewhat funky with notes of white wine, barnyard and crayola. Oily texture, soft carbonation and a tart finish. Flavour is subtly tart with aroma notes. Not really my cup of tea.

Pours light golden. Firm consistent head. Lovely unique bouquet of aromas! Orange, balsamic, slight lactic acid notes. The normally acidic-bitter pomegranate is balanced out in this triple. Quite some craftmanship. Not to mention the tasty complimenting but not over-the-top hop taste. Refreshing all the way!

Hazy golden, firm head. Funky nose, high on dry notes, some earth, citrus, slight hint of vinegar. Some dried fruits. Slight hint of that vanilla sweetness. Dry and complex on the tongue, slight bitterness, dry, acidic, loads of orange notes. Simply stunning
Bue en bouteille. Tr√®s bonne bi√®re, acide en d√©but de bouche. ensuite, on part plus sur le fruit et l¬íherbe. Finale bois√©e. Vraiment cool !

Bottle. Beermoth, Manchester. Hazy gold. Thin, sticky, lasting, white head. Bready, and yeasty. Grapefruit pith. Vanilla woodiness. White wine balsamic vinegar. Lemon pith. Loads going off. As it warms the vanilla sweetness increases. Taste is light, vinegar tart. Very dry. Lots of bitter. Palate is fresh, and tart. Soft carbonation. Finishes tart, dry, and light bitter. Lovely.

Bue en bouteille de 37.5cl chez le Ki achet√©e √† la Capsule Nancy, couleur blonde, mousse moyenne effervescence faible. Une bi√®re avec un c√¥t√© acide en d√©but de bouche bien √©quilibr√©e √† peine citronn√©e, continuit√© sur la grenade super forte qui se marrie √† la perfection avec le c√¥t√© acide de la bi√®re. En revanche hormis l¬íacidit√© du tonneau et sur la couleur qui rappelle vaguement le Sauterne, aucune saveur li√©e au ch√¢teau d¬íYquem.

Bottle shared with Simonsen
Pours orange hazy with a big frothy beige head. Smell of pomme grenate, pineapple, mint, tropical fruits and zesty citrus peel. Light to moderate sweet, fruit acids, quite fruity, some juicy tendensies from the added fruits. Ends off with a moderate bitter tail. Quite far off from the tripel base. This is just lovely stuff

Pours a cloudy orange with a dense, medium sized white head. Fruity aromas of peach, grapes and hints of wood. Taste is also very fruity with grapes and peach. A little tart, witch is very pleasant. Medium to full bodied with avg levels of co2.

Bottle. Pours cloudy golden with an off-white head. Aroma of orange, malt, some floral notes, grapefruit and lemon. Flavor is sweet and slightly sour with some fruitiness, orange, lemon and yeast. Medium body, average carbonation. Nice one.

Bottle 375ml @ Geokkjer
Pours hazy deep golden with a off-white head. Aroma has notes of malt, orange, citrus and alcohol. Taste is medium sweet and medium bitter with a long warm, orange and bitter finish. Body is full, texture is oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottle. An unclear, orange-colored beer topped by a dense, finger-thick off-white head leaving lacings. The aroma is pretty vinous, almost acetone-ish, it¬ís rather fruity and citrusy too. Vinous, citrusy, orangey flavor with a touch of pale malts. Some sugary notes. It¬ís full-bodied and pleasantly carbonated, semi-dry. Lasting fruity finish with lots of oranges. Physallis, white wine. Interesting. A bit too much to drink a lot of I think, but sure nice. 141011
On tap at Salon piva 2014. Pours bit hazy golden color, white head. Aroma is fruity, apples. Taste is sourish, medium bitter, fruits, apples, some hops in the finish.

Botella de 37.5 cl en el l√∫pulo en el momento el 21-09-2014. Color anaranjado turbio, con espuma blanca persistente. Aromas intensos y dulces de maltas y sobretodo frutas ligeramente √°cidas, naranja, pomelo, mandarina, granada... Cuerpo medio a fuerte con 9.1 vol, con buena sensaci√≥n de licor y paso por boca f√°cil y algo pastoso. Sabores maltosos algo dulces con frutas √°cidas y c√≠tricas que acaban dominando, naranja, pomelo, granada... con final no muy amargo algo especiado y con toques ligeros de vinos y maderas. Bastante buena una triple psicod√©lica total.

UPDATED: JAN 21, 2017 Tap & bottled. Hazy and deep golden body with a small, lacing white head. Aroma of yeast, grapes, citrus, pomegranate, woodisk and a little caramel. Slightly sweet flavor that ends up dry with bitter notes. Medium bodied, watery to oily texture and average carbonation. A nice Tripel. üåüüåüüåüüåü

Tapped at SALON PIVA beer festival in Bratislava/Slovakia. Golden hazy color, good head/lacing. Strong aroma of tropical fruits like oranges, tangerines, green apples. Taste is fruity, light hoppy with a marginal wine taste that makes it a bit sour. Alcohol well hidden. Overall very very tasty!
Tap at Salon piva.  Orange golden color wit medium white head. Tropical fruity hoppy aroma. Fruity taste, some sourness, some hops in finish. Tasty.

Tap at Salon piva. Intensely aromatic, strong tangerine, fruity. Hazy golden-orange colour, rather stable head. Taste is nice, fruity, zesty, almost moderate soft sourness. Very good, easily drinkable, addictive.

on tap at mikkeller and friends. hazy orange colour with a wispy white head; aroma of mango and pawpaw with some lacquered wood; some white grapeskin sweetness, light bitterness, hints of funk; classy stuff

375 mL bottle, big thanks to Charles for sharing!! Very cool, reminiscent of Mikkeller Nelson Sauvignon in a lot of ways. Slightly hazy peach pour, good lacing. Nose and flavor bring really beautiful apricot sweetness, distinct tannic tartness, red wine, almond, and tarragon herbaceousness. Smooth, belies the ABV. Very tasty.

Draught @ CBC 2014 [ Green Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2014, Sparta Hallen, Gunnar Nu Hansens Plads 11, 2100 Copenhagen, Denmark [ As To √òl Panzer Grenadier Chateau d¬í Yquem Barrel Aged ].Clear medium orange color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, white head. Aroma is moderate malty, hay, straw, toasted - caramel, wood - barrel, vegetables. Flavour is moderate sweet and light to moderate bitter with a long duration, wine, fruity, wood, hay, grass, fruity - pomegranate. Body is medium, texture is watery, carbonation is soft. [20140503]

Bottle at Gr√ºnerl√∏kka Brygghus, june 15th 2014. Dark golden body with a small offwhite head. Aroma of spicy belgian yeast, sweet honey, dark fruits and malt. Taste of flowery hops, toffee, spicy yeast esters, citrus fruits, with a strong grapefruit kick in the finish. Light acidic fruit and yeast aftertaste. Very nice!
On tap at Biercab. Orange colour with white head. Caramel, malt, honey aroma. Wine, fruity, sweet, honey taste. Medium to full body.

Leicht herber und hefiger Antrunk, s√§uerliche Beinoten. Frisch, im Mittelteil intensiver, bittere Noten kommen auf. Zunehmend fruchtig, vollmundig, die Fasslagerung ist nur hintergr√ºndig erkennbar. Gut. 11/11/10/11/9/11

Bottle thanks to David.
Appearance - cloudy lemon with a thin head of lace. 
Nose - honeysuckle combined with a tangy sour note and there is wood lurking in the background, which makes it come out as a kind of barbecued pineapple. 
Taste - ripe mango and wood tannins. Lovely. 
Palate - in some respects this is more like the palate of a wine than a beer. There is good acidity and grippy tannins and it is medium bodied with a good mouth coating texture and a long acidic finish. 
Overall - not sure I¬íd have been able to identify the fruit as being pomegranate. Lovely beer though!

International IPA day train tasting with Kenny, all aboard the 15.50 from Waterloo to Sirenville, 01/08/14.
Hazed Seville orange with a well appointed light beige covering that retains.
Nose is apricot, floral notes, hoppy tones, tangerine, candyfloss, white grape vibes.
Taste comprises juicy citric notes, apricot, light mango pulp, pommegrante, straw, subtle white wine BA effect, melon balls.
Medium + body, fine carbonation, tangy citric wash in the close.
Decent BA BS.
user_location: Hazlemere, the lower Xhitlerns, Buckinghamshire, ENGLAND

text: Tap @ Mikkeller & Friends. Aroma: Fruity, passionfruit(?), fresh. Taste: Fruity, fresh, acidic. The finish is dry and bitter.

On tap at BrewDog Shepherds Bush.¬†Golden and cloudy, with a bit of lacing. Fresh tangy scent of passionfruit lemon rind. Sour taste¬†with a citrussy overtone. A bit of savoury umami¬†at the end. Tasty¬†bitter-sour aftertaste. Excellent.

Draught at BrewDog, Shepherd¬ís Bush on 23 July. Poured a murky orange, with no head. Aroma of sour fruit, cardboard and bready malt. Pine needle hop flavour, with some melon and apple. Finish was dry grain, straw and candied fruit.

Hazy yellow, small white head.
Aroma has ripe tropical fruits, mango and pineapple.
Taste is tart and fruity, light vinous and slightly bitter.
Thin body, soft carbonation.
Short dry after taste.
Interesting one.
Tap @ Mikkeller & Friends, Copenhagen 15/7-14. Fruity and yeasty with some light acidic notes, sweet, orange and grapefruit, fresh. The finish is dry, bitter and fruity with light acidic notes.
Keg at Brewdog Birmingham; cloudy chalky amber pour with a frothy off white head, very fruity and grape aroma, taste is acidic with some slight citrus, some tart fruitiness.

Keg at Brewdog. Hazy peachy orange pondwater colour, small ring of white head. Aroma is toned down starburst sweets, maybe lemon in particular. Body is medium, low carbonation, phlegmy. Taste is watery squash, cheap heavily oaked wine, some white vinegar, tangy and drying finish, not bitter. Strangely drinkable for the ABV, but not in an overly enjoyable way.

Keg at Brewdog Shepard¬ís bush. Murky onion skin colour pour with no head. Really interesting aroma, peach Melba, fruits, guava. Orange. Flavour us slight tart orange, peach, bitter orange, slight cereal, peach. Clean ferment palate is slight tart, medium body, dry. Lingering wood and bitter orange.
On tap at CBC 2014. Hazy golden with white head. Aroma hoppy, lemon, white grapes and sweet malts. Taste is similar, soft lemon with white wine notes, candy and some alcohol.

Keg at BD. It pours hazy golden with a small white head. The nose is soft, fruity, white grape, lemon peel, some acidity, white wine and candy. The taste is bitter-sweet, lemon sherbet, limeade, white grape, candy, light alcohol, warming with a dry, somewhat citric finish. Medium body and fine carbonation. Very nice tart fruity action.

UPDATED: SEP 27, 2014 Flaske fra mikkeller bottle shop.medbrakt av Carsten. Gylden, uklar, hvit skumtopp. Smaker granateple, ananas,grapefrukt, lime. Et lite hint av furun√•l i ettersmaken. En fantastisk √∏l

Draft @ √òlfestival 2014. Pours a slightly hazy golden color with a white head. Has a fruity malty spicy woody weak yeasty aroma. Fruity malty woody and slightly tart flavor. Has a fruity malty spicy woody weak tart finish.
Draught at CBC 2014. Hazy orange colour with a white head. Aroma and flavour of fruit, oak, yeast and tartness.

On tap @ Chmielarnia, Warsaw. Very hazed, orange colour. Yeast and pomeganate in aroma. A bit sour in taste. Condenced pomegranate juice, grape notes and some white wine notes. After a few sips pomegranate sourness covers other notes. Dry and different one.

duft. frisk. en smule duft af eg. √¶blejuice 
smag: frisk. s√∏d. √¶ble. frike r√∏de b√¶r eftersmag. starten er meget s√∏d men slutter af en smule t√∏r i eftersmagen.
en fin √∏l men savner noget mere duft.

Aroma and taste is slight sour and fruity, floral am grassy, rather juicy, nice palate, decent enough. 

---Sent via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle at home. Pours a hazy orange with an off-white head. Sweet with a light bitterness an hints of acidity. Aromas of grapes and some cask wood. Hints of lemonade. Medium to full bodied. Soft carbonation. Dry finish with more fresh wine notes.

01-JUL-2014, draft @Taphouse.
Very hazy orange with lasting, lacing, White head.
Aroma is yeast, straw, fruit, wine. Taste is verry fruity. Multifruit juice with peach, pineapple, orange, ...
Sweet, wine-like. Definately sauternes. Big body, soft to medium carbonation. Slight tartness. Amazing.

Bouteille 375ml de HopDuvel, BB 17/04/2022.
Orang√©e, col √©pais et cr√©meux blanc.
Ar√¥me au bouquet barrique g√©n√©reux, fruit√© avec ce rappel de raisin ferment√©, fleurs de houblon avec un c√¥t√© noble. Je note peu cet ajout de grenade.
Palais est fruit√© avec un bon ajout de grenade tout en ayant ce profil belge notamment au niveau levure tirant ici vers une triple.
Fini un suret avec une br√®ve amertume citronn√©e et houblonn√©e. Le c√¥t√© vin blanc n¬íest pas en reste et vient balancer parfaitement la bi√®re. Effervescence correcte ponctu√©e par ces rappels de vin blanc et l√©ger bois√©.

Draft. An unclear dark golden beer with a lazing white head. The aroma has notes of over ripe fruits, phenols, yeast, and malt. The flavor is very sweet with notes of grapes, alcohol, yeast, fruits, phenols, and brettanomyces, leading to a tart finish.

UPDATED: MAY 1, 2015 Re-rate from a bottle bought at the same agm we went to the pub after (rating below!) Any road up, all flavours seem to have melded together nicely. Still very mandarin citrus, slight sour note. +1 aroma, +1 overall.

Keg at Brewdog Aberdeen. Pours clear amber, thin white head. Fruity aromas, mandarin and tropical fruit. Taste is light sweet, with more fresh fruit flavours, light bitterness at the end. Full-bodied and rich. Good stuff.
CBC. Clear yellow with an off-white head. Aroma is sweet, malty and fruity. Flavor is quite sweet. Sweet finish. 030514
Draught at Mikkeller & Friends. Hazy golden with a small white head. Aroma light malty, medium+ sour, notes of barrel and brett. Flavor light sweet, medium+ sour. Medium body, strange.
Hazy amber colour with small head.Aroma is fruity of exotic fruits most like apricot,mango and greapfruits,nice bitternes and also spicey and even taste of wood and yeast.

0,375 l bottle BB 17.04.2022 From Biervana 
barnyard, basement aromas, leaves, floral, herbs, golden, cloudy, frothy, white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, heavily sour, medium body, creamy, sticky, lively,

Smakprov p√• CBC 2014. Smak och doft av passionsfrukt, citron, citrus vita druvor, fat. Torr, stram, frisk och syrlig, juicekarkat√§r. En som Daniel f√∂rstod det 9% trippel med granat√§ppeljuice som lagrats p√• Chateau d¬íyquem-fat. Mycket trevligt √∂l som snarare upplevs som ett lagom s√∂tt glas vitt vin.

UPDATED: OCT 12, 2014 3rd May 2014CBC Session 4. Lightly hazy gold beer, small white head. Palate is crisp. Minerals. Lightly tart orange and a whisper of lemon. Crisp finish. Fruity and lively. 1st August 2014Train tasting with Colin on the way to Siren. Hazy gold - amber beer, tidy pale cream colour head. Palate is airy and a little soft. Light fine carbonation. Airy malts, whisper of spice. Nice tangy fruits, little bitter wood and mild vanilla. Bitter citric peel. Tangy wine and a whisper of sherbet. Very nice.

Bottle. Pours hazy golden with a off-white medium head. Aroma is apricot, toasted malt, pomegranate, grapefruit, tart fruit, oak, yellow raisin and wine. Taste is light+ sweet, bitter and tart. Body is medium, texture is creamy, carbonation is moderate. Finishes crisp, fruity and tart.
Draught at CBC 2014. Clear golden/amber - white head. Nice barrel and grape taste, sweetness, wine, cinnamon, spicy, tartness, apple, estery, peppery, grape fruity notes. OK fresh notes.

Tap @ CBC, 14. Hazy amber with small white head. Aroma is malt, fruit, caramel, yeast, hop and citrus. Flavour is malt, fruit, caramel, yeast, hop, wood, sweet, toasted, little grapefruit and medium bitter.
Draught at K√ò14. Sweet white grape aroma. Woody, not sour. Cloudy golden colour. Small white head. The flavour has a good vanilla and grape note. Slightly citric. Easily drinkable.

Bottle. Golden and hazy with a thin white head. The aroma is very fruity with notes af gooseberries and grapefruit. It has some some similarities with a nice dry White wine. The taste is dry and bitter with a sour and bit astringent finish. Overall a very nice beer.

Bottle. Hazy orange with a large off white head. Flowery and fruity, light wood, dusty, light herbal. Medium/full body, oily texture, medium carbonation, medium sweet, light bitter and sour. Alcohol well hidden. Pretty delicious.

Bottle. Pours hazy golden with a creamy white head. The aroma is vinous and fruity. Light apples and oak. The flavour has some dry sour notes along with fruity and zesty notes. Malty backbone. Alcohol is very well hidden.

38cl, at 9.1%Vol, as Panzer Grenadier, brewed at De Proefbrouwerij, new exclusive Danish brew Anno 2014 (aged on Ch. d¬íYquem-barrels!), with pomegranate, from De Hopduvel Gent, complex fruit brew, woody/fruity and slightly vinous/floral/sweet, yet not too heavy, very balanced, hazy, rocky head, very good brew, yet expensive!
From tap. Hazy orange with a small white head. Aroma is peachy and grapefruity. Smooth peachy and grapefruity. Smooth fruity and peachy, grapefruity. Citrusy and lingering peachy finish.

Draught CBC 2014. Dark amber coloured. Off white dense head. Aroma. Sweetness, fruits, spice, wood, citrus. Flavour. Sweetness, fruits, barrel, citrus, spice. Medium to full bodied. Ends sourish and grapy with a fuity touch.

Pre pale ale tasting/Dolle und Halling Maters of the Universe tasting. Unclear amber body with a small white head. Hops, oak, white wine, tart, fruit, ripe fruit. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle @ Pre Pale Ale Tasting/ Dolle und Halling Masters Of The Universe Tasting. Pours hazy dark golden with a creamy white foam. Sweet and fruity. Some white wine and chardonnay like notes. Fruity and dry. Very smooth and tasty. Lovely. A winner!

Draught @ CBC 2014. Pours golden with a white head. Aroma of malt, belgian yeas, honey, fruity, apples, citrus, wood. Flavor is malty, yeast, sweet fruity, apples, citrus, grapefruit, light tart. Medium body, lively carbonation, warming alcohol in the finish. 030514
Aroma of apples, pear, pineapple, citrus & vanilla. Cloudy golden with large white head. Taste of clementines, pomelo & lemon. Medium body & average carbonation.

Draught at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2014, session 3. Golden/Amber beer with a decent offwhite head. Sourish aroma, plastic, grassy, yeasty notes. Floral grassy flavor, hay, yeast, citrus, spicy notes. Ok beer with some strange notes.

Draught at CBC 2014.
Clear amber coloured with a small white head.
Fruity aroma of caramel, oak, hops and white wine.
Fruity and light acidic flavour of white wine grapes and oak.
Fruity finish.
Tap at the Copenhagen beer festival... Golden amber... Thin white lacing... Soft thin oily orange... Soft fruits.. Dry orange... Dry sharp finish

Draught at CBC¬í14. Amber color, white head. Bitter taste with citrus, hops, peach, mango, earthy notes and resin. Bitter finish with mango, peach, citrus, ripe fruits and resin. Excellent belgian strong ale.
Sampled @ CBC 2014. Slightly unclear orange color, small white head. Orangepeel, lightly hops, slightly wood, slightly vineous, some fruityness. Dry finish. Decent.

CBC 2014
Pours clear golden with ow white head
Aromas of honey, syrup, caramel, sweet frutis
Tasste has nice sweet notes of passion fruit, pineapple, caramel and honey

CBC 2014. Pours a semi-clear apricot with a very low white head. Aromas of apricot, honey, peach and caramel. Taste is apricot, peach, honey, funk and caramel. Mouthfeel is sprightly with medium body. Aftertaste is peach, apricot and funk.
Pours hazy amber with low white head. Aroma of lychee, peach, grapes, apricot. Taste is sweetish berries and fruit with light sour finish. Light, smooth body with soft carbonation.

Sample @ CBC 14. Pours a clear amber beer with a small off white head on top. Aroma is very fruity, loads of pineapple and vineous characters. Flavor is medium sour, loads of wine and wood. A bit weird and messy to be honest.

Tap @ CBC 2014. Pours hazy orange yellow with a small, creamy white film head. Aroma has apricot, vinious, malts, oak. Medium carbonation, fine creamy and light dry mouthfeel. Flavour has good fresh hops, tart fruitiness, oak, citrus, apples, soft funk. Very well balanced.

Draft at CBC 2014. Pours hazy golden with an off white head. Aroma is vinous, white grapes, wood, barrel aspects and citrus. Flavour is light sweet and light moderate acidic. Medium bodied with moderate carbonation.
